Address.description: Address information for a person associated with this application not at the property address

Agent.description: Information about the agent or proxy who completed the application on behalf of someone else

Applicant.description: The user who completed the application either for themself or on behalf of someone else

BaseApplicant.description: Information about the user who completed the application for themself, or information about the person who the user applied on behalf of

CalculateMetadata.description: Metadata associated with PlanX Calculate components used to determine fees throughout a service

DateTime.description: Regex-based implementation of iso-date-time until available in ajv-formats@3.0.0

Declaration.description: Declarations about the accuracy of this application and any personal connections to the receiving authority
Declaration.title: #Declaration

Feature.description: A feature object which contains a geometry and associated properties. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.2

bbox.description: Bounding box of the coordinate range of the object's Geometries, Features, or Feature Collections. The value of the bbox member is an array of length 2*n where n is the number of dimensions represented in the contained geometries, with all axes of the most southwesterly point followed by all axes of the more northeasterly point. The axes order of a bbox follows the axes order of geometries. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-5

id.description: A value that uniquely identifies this feature in a https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.2.

type.description: Specifies the type of GeoJSON object.

noticeGiven.description: Has requisite notice been given to all the known owners and agricultural tenants?

ownersKnown.description: Do you know the names and addresses of all owners and agricultural tenants?

type.description: Specifies the type of GeoJSON object.

Position.description: A Position is an array of coordinates. https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7946#section-3.1.1 Array should contain between two and three elements. The previous GeoJSON specification allowed more elements (e.g., which could be used to represent M values), but the current specification only allows X, Y, and (optionally) Z to be defined.

payable.description: Total payable fee after any exemptions or reductions in GBP

applicable.description: Would disclosure of any of the information provided by the user in the pre-application harm someone's commercial interests?
Is any of of the information provided by the user in the pre-application sensitive?

boundary.description: HM Land Registry Index polygon for this property, commonly referred to as the blue line boundary, sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/title-boundary

localAuthorityDistrict.description: Current and historic UK Local Authority Districts that contain this address sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/local-authority-district

planning.description: Planning constraints and policies that intersect with this site and may impact or restrict development

sources.description: A list of open data requests or websites that explain how these constraints were sourced

PrototypeFileType.description: Types of planning documents and drawings

organisation.description: The reference code for the organisation responsible for processing this planning application, sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/local-authority

PrototypeRequestedFiles.description: File types requested by this service. Schema["files"] will be a subset of this list based on the user's journey through the service

Region.description: The region in England that contains this address sourced from planning.data.gov.uk/dataset/region, where London is a proxy for the Greater London Authority (GLA) area
Region.title: #Region

Responses.description: The ordered list of questions, answers, and their metadata for the application

SiteContact.description: Contact information for the site visit

SiteContactOther.description: Contact information for the site visit when the SiteContact's role is 'other'

User.description: The role of the user who completed the application

UserAddressNotSameSite.description: Address information for an applicant with contact information that differs from the property address
UserAddressNotSameSite.title: #UserAddressNotSameSite

UserOverrides.description: Administrative data suggested by PlanX which the user overrode or changed
